LanguageData.Hemera_explosion_Transplanter.label: Hemera -Energy Explosion-
LanguageData.Hemera_explosion_Transplanter.descriptio: It is an unknown magic book created through a spirit stone. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can gain the ability of Hemera Energy Blast through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_link_shield_Transplanter.label: Hemera -Link Shield-
LanguageData.Hemera_link_shield_Transplanter.descript: It is an unknown magic book created through a spirit stone. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can acquire the ability of the Hemera Link Shield through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_Acceleration_Ability_Transplanter: It is an unknown magic book created through a spirit stone. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can gain the ability of Hemera Body Acceleration through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_Coagulate_Transplanter.label: Hemera -Recovery-
LanguageData.Hemera_Coagulate_Transplanter.descriptio: It is an unknown magic book created through a spirit stone. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can obtain Clucking Fog through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_energy_shockwave_Transplanter.des: It is an unknown magic book created through a spirit stone. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can obtain Hemera energy shockwaves through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_Teleport_Transplanter.label: Hemera -Teleport-
LanguageData.Hemera_Teleport_Transplanter.description: It is an unknown magic book created through a spirit stone. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can obtain teleportation through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_spear_Transplanter.label: Blood -Blood Spear-
LanguageData.Hemera_spear_Transplanter.description: It is a type of magic book known as the Black Book of Blood. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can acquire the ability of Blood Spear through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_blood_moon_Transplanter.label: Blood -Blood Moon-
LanguageData.Hemera_blood_moon_Transplanter.descripti: It is a type of magic book known as the Black Book of Blood. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can acquire the ability of Blood Moon through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_bondage_Transplanter.label: Blood -chain of blood-
LanguageData.Hemera_bondage_Transplanter.description: It is a type of magic book known as the Black Book of Blood. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can gain the Blood Chain ability through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_blood_armor_Transplanter.label: Blood -Blood Armor-
LanguageData.Hemera_blood_armor_Transplanter.descript: It is a type of magic book known as the Black Book of Blood. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can acquire the ability of Blood Armor through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_BloodCharge_Transplanter.label: Blood -Blood Charge-
LanguageData.Hemera_BloodCharge_Transplanter.descript: It is a type of magic book known as the Black Book of Blood. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can gain the Blood Armor ability through this book.
LanguageData.Hemera_energy_drain_Transplanter.label: Blood -Blood Drain-
LanguageData.Hemera_energy_drain_Transplanter.descrip: It is a type of magic book known as the Black Book of Blood. Settlers with the Hemera Mine gene can acquire the ability of Hemera Drain through this book.
